Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the extent of road development that took place after independence by stating that only 1,800 kilometers of tarmacked roads existed at independence.
Understate: The claim may be understating the extent of road development that took place after independence by not acknowledging the additional 11,200 kilometers of tarmacked roads that were built.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks specific evidence or data to support the statement that only 1,800 kilometers of tarmacked roads existed at independence.
